content:
Design a simple 3D Mechanical Gear. A Gear is a circular tool used for controlling the speed or
direction of a machine. It has teeth that engage with another gear in order to rotate. You may use the
Array command to ensure that the teeth are aligned properly.

Design a simple 3D Mechanical Gear. A Gear is a circular tool used for controlling the speed or
direction of a machine. It has teeth that engage with another gear in order to rotate. You may use the
Array command to ensure that the teeth are aligned properly.
